title: Laodicea (Arcadia)
text: Laodicea (), also transliterated as Laodiceia or Laodikeia, was an ancient city of <a href="Arcadia%20%28ancient%20region%29">Arcadia</a>, in the <a href="Peloponnese">Peloponnese</a>, <a href="Greece">Greece</a>. It is located between <a href="Megalopolis%2C%20Greece">Megalopolis</a> and <a href="Oresthasion">Oresthasion</a> (Orestium).
